attributes.action: Unite the UK and Australia in a personal union if Scotland leaves.
attributes.background:
If Scotland leaves the union England will be weaker on the world stage. The economy will crash, quality of life will plummet, etc.
I propose the UK to unite with Australia. Why? Australia and the UK share the same language, culture, monarch, etc. Australia also has a high GDP and standard of living

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected as it is not something the UK Government or Parliament could do, as it would need to consent of the Australian Government. However you could create a petition asking the UK Government to negotiate with the Australia Government the terms of a union between the two countries.

If you do want to create a new petition calling for this you need to give your full name as we can only accept petition is full name of the creator has been given.
